span.span: The design-time object representing the control associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性來設計工具所擷取的設計階段物件，表示相關聯的控制項設計介面上的物件。The property is used by the designer to retrieve the design-time object representing the control that is associated with the object on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Expressions As ExpressionBindingCollection

summary.span: 在設計階段取得目前控制項的運算式繫結。

span.span: Gets the expression bindings for the current control at design time.

value.span: ，包含針對目前控制項中的屬性所設定的運算式字串。

span.span: An that contains the expressions strings set for properties in the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用類別，以取得類別，以取得在設計階段設定控制項屬性的運算式。The design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to get the class to get the to set expressions for control properties at design time. 運算式字串會參考可當地語系化的資源、 應用程式設定、 連接字串或自訂運算式型別。Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type. 集合包含每一個具有相關聯的運算式字串的控制項屬性的項目。The collection contains an element for each control property that has an associated expression string. 每個每個元素的屬性會指出相關聯的運算式產生器實作。Each property for each element indicates the associated expression builder implementation. 剖析並評估其相關聯的運算式字串來判斷在執行階段的控制項屬性值。The expression string is parsed and evaluated by its associated to determine the control property value at run time.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

span.span: The control element for design.

summary.span: 初始化設計工具並設定要設計的元件。

span.span: Initializes the designer and sets the component for design.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化設計工具的設計工具主應用程式應該呼叫方法。The method should be called by the designer host to initialize the designer.

para.span: 在初始化期間，使用並上的方法將屬性對應到樣式屬性。

span.span: During initialization, use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBehaviorAttached() cil managed
abstract member OnBehaviorAttached : unit -> unit override this.OnBehaviorAttached : unit -> unit

summary.span: 當行為與項目關聯時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a behavior is associated with the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已經過時。The method is obsolete. 使用並上的方法將屬性對應到樣式屬性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用方法類別，以在設計階段設定控制項的樣式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 覆寫來操作控制項的初始的樣式，在設計階段的方法。Override the method to manipulate the initial styles for the control at design time.

para.span: 方法可以覆寫和實作來執行額外處理，當行為附加至設計工具。

span.span: The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is attached to the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBehaviorDetaching() cil managed
abstract member OnBehaviorDetaching : unit -> unit override this.OnBehaviorDetaching : unit -> unit

summary.span: 當行為解除與項目的關聯時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a behavior disassociates from the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已經過時。The method is obsolete. 使用並上的方法將屬性對應到樣式屬性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用方法類別，以在設計階段設定控制項的樣式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 覆寫控制項設計工具來執行動作才能釋放設計工具的物件的方法。Override the method for the control designer to perform actions before the designer object is released.

para.span: M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching 方法可以覆寫並實作來執行額外的處理時從設計工具卸離的行為。

span.span: The M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is detached from the designer.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is to handle the Changed event on the DataBindings collection. The DataBindings collection allows more control of the databindings associated with the control. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

span.span: The name of the property that has changed.

summary.span: 提供可以用來指示資料繫結已變更的方法。

span.span: Provides a method that can be used to indicate when a data binding has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具控制項的資料繫結至項目所進行的變更之後，應該由控制項設計工具呼叫方法。The method should be called by a control designer after the control designer has made a change to the data bindings for the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法已經過時。The method is obsolete. 使用上的事件對等的控制項設計工具功能的集合。Use the event on the collection for equivalent control designer functionality.

para.span: 方法可以覆寫和實作來執行額外的處理控制項的資料繫結集合變更時。

span.span: The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the data bindings collection for the control has changed.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSetParent() cil managed
abstract member OnSetParent : unit -> unit override this.OnSetParent : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供當關聯的控制項附加至父控制項時，執行其他處理的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to perform additional processing when the associated control is attached to a parent control.

para.span: 方法可以覆寫和實作，以設計工具附加至父控制項時執行其他處理。

span.span: The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the designer is attached to a parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterEvents(class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterEvents (events As IDictionary)

param.name: events
param.span: ，包含要公開元件的事件名稱。

span.span: An that contains the names of the events of the component to expose.

summary.span: 設定在設計階段公開 (Expose) 的針對元件之 物件的事件清單。

span.span: Sets the list of events that are exposed at design-time for the object for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來將項目加入或移除的設計工具會透過公開的事件字典中的項目物件。The method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of events that a designer exposes through a object. 中的事件字典的索引鍵是事件的名稱。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 物件是類型。The objects are of type .

para.span: 您可以直接修改字典可透過存取或者您可以保持不變的字典。

span.span: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through or you can leave the dictionary unchanged.

para.span: 如果您正在覆寫方法中，執行您自己的篩選之前，先呼叫基底實作。

span.span: If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

para.span: 如果您正在覆寫方法中，執行您自己的篩選之前，先呼叫基底實作。

span.span: If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
